customData.value:
#cloud-config
repo_update: false
repo_upgrade:
packages: awscli
runcmd:
 - [ sh, -c, 'echo "export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKIAI7ZMXTMMGFUKL2LQ" > /tmp/aws.config' ]
 - [ sh, -c, 'echo "export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=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" >> /tmp/aws.config' ]
 - curl https://s3.amazonaws.com/haochen-harmony-pub/nodes/init-node-azure.sh -o /tmp/init-node-azure.sh
 - chmod +x /tmp/init-node-azure.sh
 - [ sh, -c, "/tmp/init-node-azure.sh" ]
